excerpt: "Demand for orthopedic medical imaging systems is projected to be driven by the rising prevalence of orthopedic disorders and the growing geriatric population across the world. Increasing incidence of obesity and rapid technological advancements in the medical imaging field are also anticipated to favor market growth throughout the forecast period."
